com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools

Class ShapeCreationTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.Tool
      • com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools.ShapeCreationTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnKeyListener

    public class ShapeCreationTool
extends Tool
    Tool for the creation of a (possibly incomplete) polygonal map region. Once the user has finished creating a shape with the tool, returns the uid of the newly created Shape in an intent specified by the user by setting the "callback" parcelable when starting the tool. This is an intent to fire when the tool is completed.
